sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>previous</radical> <radical>tsunami</radical> gave everything in this town a good <kanji>wash</kanji>. There are many Laundromats in this town so when the previous tsunami hit, all of the detergent mixed with the water and gave everything a good wash.
meaningInfo: Imagine this soapy tsunami, washing all the things in town. Hear the soapy waves bubbling with cleanliness as they crash down around you.
readingMnemonic: All the Laundromats in town are owned by <reading>cen</reading>taurs (<ja>せん</ja>), and they got a good <kanji>wash</kanji> as well. Being half horse, centaurs have a lot of hair that needs washing. Luckily, the soap tsunami gave them a good wash too.
readingInfo: Imagine these centaurs frolicking around in the aftermath of the previous tsunami. It’s just like a big bathtub for them. Hear them splashing and neighing in the water.
